conbody.p: You can create a new RESTful request object in two ways. First, you can add a Web Service request to a New or any Existing test case directly in the object details view by a click on the plus icon.

image.alt: Add web service request to a test case

conbody.p: Or select File > New > Web Service Request from the main menu.
In the New Web Service Request dialog, specify a name for your request; select RESTful in the Request Type's drop-down list; and set request URLs. Then click OK to create a request.

image.alt: Create a new web service request
